2. Sovereign defaults The data on sovereign defaults in Figure 3 and Tables 2 and 3 comes from the most recent vintage of the dataset compiled by Reinhart and Rogoff (2009). Only sovereign defaults to private external creditors are included. The data does not consider sovereign defaults and arrears to official creditors (e.g. other governments or the IMF). See Reinhart and Trebesch (2014, 2015) for data updates and default data on official creditors.
